source: TEXT_GAIUSB504_00873_SEQ_00<tab>The ache you carry cannot have escaped Father Iliud's sharp eyes, yet he makes no note of it.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB504_00873_SEQ_00<tab>聖アダマ・ランダマ教会のイリュドは、届けてほしいものがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB504_00873_SEQ_01<tab>Iliud bids you go to Lost Hope, a raft of exiles lashed to the graceful ship of Ul'dah, and deliver four sticks of vilekin repellent to Zazawaka.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB504_00873_SEQ_01<tab>イリュドは疫病の原因となる虫から流民街の人々を守りたいようだ。ロストホープ流民街の「ザザワカ」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E872901 /var>」を届けよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB504_00873_SEQ_02<tab>Immediately wary and just as immediately courteous, Zazawaka asks you to apply the repellent. Take the sticks and use them at the appointed locations.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB504_00873_SEQ_02<tab>ザザワカから<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E872901 /var>の散布を頼まれた。ロストホープ流民街の中の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E8CB101 /var>」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E872901 /var>」を撒こう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB504_00873_SEQ_03<tab>You have applied the repellent. Report your success to Zazawaka.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB504_00873_SEQ_03<tab>散布が終了した。ロストホープ流民街の「ザザワカ」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB504_00873_SEQ_04<tab>Grateful for your assistance, Zazawaka shares his private worries with you. You have no words of comfort, for the exile speaks true. Return to the Church of Saint Adama Landama and report to Father Iliud.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB504_00873_SEQ_04<tab>ザザワカは、冒険者に感謝をしているようだ。聖アダマ・ランダマ教会に戻り、「イリュド」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB504_00873_SEQ_05<tab>You speak with Father Iliud, and sense the depth of his grief for the fate of these people. On your own cares too, he gives a brief and gentle counsel.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB504_00873_SEQ_05<tab>イリュドに報告した。ロストホープ流民街を救済することは、教会の使命のひとつのようだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB504_00873_TODO_00<tab>Show Zazawaka the sticks of vilekin repellent.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB504_00873_TODO_00<tab>ロストホープ流民街のザザワカに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E872901 /var>を見せる

source: TEXT_GAIUSB504_00873_TODO_01<tab>Sprinkle the repellent at the destinations.
TEXT_GAIUSB504_00873_TODO_03<tab>Return to the church and report to Iliud.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB504_00873_TODO_03<tab>聖アダマ・ランダマ教会のイリュドに報告

source: TEXT_GAIUSB504_00873_ILIUD_000_000<tab>Death begets death, especially in those places where privation is the sovereign. A corse left unburied is as a rich field to vilekin, where they may sow pestilence and water it with their miasma.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB504_00873_ILIUD_000_000まことに哀しいことですが、人死にが多くなると、
その骸から不浄な虫が湧き、毒気を広めてしまいます。
そうなれば、流行病によって、さらなる犠牲者が……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB504_00873_ILIUD_000_001<tab>Nowhere is the rule of privation so apparent as in Lost Hope. A man may die upon the roadside there and go unclaimed, for no ties bind these unhappy folk together except a common misfortune: their homelands are no more.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB504_00873_ILIUD_000_001不衛生な「ロストホープ流民街」などでは、
一歩間違えば、大勢の犠牲者を出しかねません。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB504_00873_ILIUD_000_002<tab>But as long as they live, some hope remains, and so we must thwart pestilence ere it begins. Will you deliver this repellent to that den of sorrow?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB504_00873_ILIUD_000_002流民の皆さんを護るために、
ロストホープ流民街にいる「ザザワカ」さんに、
この「」を届けていただけませんか？

source: TEXT_GAIUSB504_00873_ZAZAWAKA_000_020<tab>What business do you have here, stranger? Oh, you come from the Church of Saint Adama Landama?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB504_00873_ZAZAWAKA_000_020なんだい君は？
……へぇ、聖アダマ・ランダマ教会からの使いなのかい。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB504_00873_ZAZAWAKA_000_025<tab>Ah, the vilekin repellent. The good father told me last moon of this plan. He is a man that keeps his word, and 'twas kind of him to have you deliver it.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB504_00873_ZAZAWAKA_000_025ああ、「」か。
たしかに、イリュド神父から連絡を受けているよ。
わざわざ届けてもらって悪いねえ。助かるよ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB504_00873_ZAZAWAKA_000_026<tab>Did he tell you where─and how─these are to be used? I fear I have little knowledge of alchemy.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB504_00873_ZAZAWAKA_000_026ついでに、この流民街の虫が湧きそうな場所に、
撒いてきてくれると、もっと助かるよ。
TEXT_GAIUSB504_00873_DUUMY_000_030<tab>ロストホープ貧民街内の指定地点に、虫除けを使用する　×４くらい

source: TEXT_GAIUSB504_00873_ZAZAWAKA_000_040<tab>Thank you, stranger. This place may seem wretched to you, and none here would deny it is. But last year, it had the look of a charnel house, so fiercely did the pestilence rage. Tell Father Iliud we owe him a debt of life.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB504_00873_ZAZAWAKA_000_040何から何まで、本当に助かったよ。
去年は流行病で、多くの貧民が亡くなったからね。
神父様にも礼を言っておいてくれ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB504_00873_ZAZAWAKA_000_041<tab>I confess, though, I wonder if we are saved from a plague only to perish in war. We have little love for Garlemald here, and news of them who burned our homes travels fast.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB504_00873_ZAZAWAKA_000_041そういえば、最近、帝国が妙な動きをしてるんだってな。
こんな辺境の流民街でさえ、不穏な噂をよく耳にするよ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB504_00873_ZAZAWAKA_000_042<tab>What chance does Lost Hope have against a force that plucked Ala Mhigo like a ripe peach? Fight or flee, we must make plans. Yet few have ears to listen to me. They have too much to fear already, too many demons to slay every hour.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB504_00873_ZAZAWAKA_000_042戦争が再開したら、ここなんてひとたまりもないのに、
みんな慣れちまってて、関心がないのが怖いよ。
……神父様くらいさ、俺たちのことを心配してくれるのは。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB504_00873_ILIUD_000_060<tab>Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Sometimes for what ails us in thinking, we find relief in doing.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB504_00873_ILIUD_000_060どうやら無事に届けられたようですね、感謝いたします。
体を動かすことで、少しは辛い気持ちを解消できると思い、
こうやって依頼をさせていただいたのです。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB504_00873_ILIUD_000_061<tab>The ministration to exiles is one of the duties of the Church of Saint Adama Landama. I pray that someday, with the grace of the gods, they may find again what they have lost.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB504_00873_ILIUD_000_061流民街の方々の救済は、私たちの使命のひとつ。
本当は、彼らに安住の地を探してさしあげることができれば
良いのですがね……。
